indicators.description: These are the results of the Research Excellence Framework, where university departments in various disciplines are assessed on the quality of their research. The latest REF was conducted in 2014 so data is available only for one year

value.description: The mean REF score for the NUTS2 area. This is the average of the scores in all departments weighted by the Full time equivalents submitted in each category (4*, 3*, 2* with higher scores representing better assessments)
value.label: Mean Research Excellence Framework Score

indicators.description_short: Mean REF Score in STEM disciplines
indicators.description: These are the results of the Research Excellence Framework, where university departments in various disciplines are assessed on the quality of their research. The latest REF was conducted in 2014 so data is available only for one year

value.description: The mean REF score for the NUTS2 area considering only STEM subjects (see aux/ref_stem.txt) for the subjects that we selected. This is the average of the scores in all departments weighted by the Full time equivalents submitted in each category (4*, 3*, 2* with higher scores representing better assessments)
value.label: Mean Research Excellence Framework Score

indicators.description_short: Total number of researchers assessed as excellent
indicators.description: These are the results of the Research Excellence Framework, where university departments in various disciplines are assessed on the quality of their research. The latest REF was conducted in 2014 so data is available only for one year

value.description: The total number of excellent researchers (4* score) submitted by universities in the NUTS-2 region for the 2014 REF
value.label: Total number of excellent researchers in REF (Full Time Equivalent)

indicators.description_short: Employment in cultural, entertainment and leisure industries
